summary: A Django test suite that validates automatic naming of many‑to‑many relationship columns, confirms that many‑to‑many tables are created within subpackage model modules, and ensures models are correctly discovered in the test package.
business_intent: To guarantee that the ORM generates correctly named many‑to‑many columns and places the corresponding tables in the appropriate subpackage, and that model discovery functions as expected, thereby maintaining the integrity of the model package's database schema.
